articles.title: Biden marks Earth Day with new solar energy funds and steps to stand up American Climate Corps - CNN
articles.description: Biden travels marks Earth Day from Triangle, Virginia, on Monday.
articles.content: President Joe Biden traveled to Triangle, Virginia, Monday to mark Earth Day, unveiling $7 billion in grant funding for solar power under the Inflation Reduction Act and announcing new steps to stand… [+3435 chars]

articles.author: Marlene Lenthang
articles.title: Police arrest pro-Palestinian supporters at encampment on Yale University plaza - NBC News
articles.description: Police officers on Monday arrested protesters who had set up an encampment on Yale University’s campus in support of the Palestinian cause, one of a growing number of American universities to see demonstrations surrounding the ongoing Israel-Hamas war.
